name: 4th European Conference on Cosmetics and Dermatology
content: The global cosmetics market was valued at USD 254.08 billion in 2021, and it is anticipated that it will expand at a CAGR of 5.3% from 2022 to 2028\. One of the key factors driving market expansion over the forecast period is the significant rise in consumer adoption of skincare and personal care products, coupled with an ageing worldwide population. The hair care industry is predicted to experience strong revenue growth between 2022 and 2028, at a CAGR of 6.2%. The increase in the prevalence of skin issues in the region is one of the major factors fueling the growth of the dermatological devices market. The number of people between the ages of 30 and 50 is growing, what is fueling the French market for cosmetics. We can see about the recent researchers in this field, to visit Cosmetics 2023
